General.Name: Jinhong Fashion Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinhong Fashion Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacturing, and sale of apparels and accessories for women, men, and children in China. The company offers dresses, sweaters and coats; leather and sample garments, furs, accessories, down jackets, cotton coats, trousers, suspenders, suits, overalls, and nikes; handicraft products; and gifts. It sells its products under the TEENIEWEENIE, VGRASS, and Yuanxian brand names. The company was formerly known as V-Grass Fashion Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Jinhong Fashion Group Co.,Ltd. in June 2019. Jinhong Fashion Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: No. 240, Chating East Street, Nanjing, China, 210017
